resources.string: Shut down in %1$d minutes without signal output
There is a problem with authentication

ScreenCast Pro is the controller software of ScreenCast box. It integrates such features as Swtich, Broadcast, Annotation, Record, Snapshot, Settings, etc. By ScreenCast APP, your teaching and meeting will be more efficient and convenient.

On devices that don\'t support Miracast and Airplay, or devices that don\'t work well with Miracast, you can cast the view and sound of your device to the screen through the "Cast My Device" feature in the ScreenCast app.

If you have equipped multiple ScreenCast boxes, you can relay the main screen to the other screens with ScreenCast boxes at any time, or display the screens of other ScreenCast boxes on the main screen."
The screen image can be saved to USB drive, Classroom AP, and ScreenCast App.
You can use the "Annotation" feature to annotate on the screen at any time; you can also do it in the ScreenCast app, and the annotations are fully synchronized.

You can select the screen source to be displayed from the source list. The ScreenCast box provides various screen layout, supports cast protocols such as Miracast, Airplay, Mythware wireless protocol, IP camera, and displays multimedia files such as picture, video, Word, Excel and PDF. What\'s more, the screens of multiple ScreenCast boxes in the network can be displayed on the main screen.
Capture the current screen and share, and the snapshot file is saved in the gallery of the controller device;
You can use the "Record" feature. The recorded video and audio will be saved to the USB drive or Classroom AP. You can also download the recorded file to the ScreenCast app.
The current screen view and sound are recorded and shared as a short video, which will be saved in the gallery of the controller device.

Support for importing the student list in Excel 97-2003, but some rules should be followed: the first column is the student name (up to 30 characters); the second column is the Smartpen ID(up to 30 characters); Either student names or Smartpen IDs should not be duplicate; Click the "Save template" button to save the template file to the root directory of the USB flash drive.
